content:
Have a question regarding ecr Now app. We are trying to use ecr Now app in our EHR (EPIC) system using Smart on FHIR app and have a question regarding configuration.
Is it just required to pass the data from our end to the app to perform further process based on the events defined in the app?
Or do we need to configure events at our end to invoke particular event in the app?
Please advise. Thank you!

You will have to pass the patient and encounter context , the app will take care of the rest in terms of events, actions and creating the data.
You will have to perform certain configuration as documented in the readme.
